verbs.description: If [ARG1: it] [V: ’s] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: obvious to all Kossacks] [ARGM-TMP: yet] , many of us , including me , see that the Special Counsel ’s investigation into probable criminal activity by Donald Trump as he conducts his investigation ...
